error_details.explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'brother_current_age' (32) was used instead of 'years_ago' (20).

context.question: N/A
context.flawed_solution:
#### 28
If Trevor's brother is 32 years old today then 20 years ago he was = 32-20 = <<32-20=12>>12 years old
If Trevor's brother was 12 years old and he was twice Trevor's age, then Trevor was 12/2 = <<12/2=6>>6 years old
If Trevor was 6 years old 32 years ago, then he must be 6 + 32 = <<6+32=38>>38 years old today
If Trevor is 38 years old today then a decade ago he must have been 38-10 = <<38-10=28>>28 years old
